original_title:
A Muslim migrant told a German police officer that he shouldn’t have a German Shepherd because dogs are ‘disgusting’ and ‘haram’.

The dog didn’t like it and scared the shit out of him.

“Get this dirty mutt away from me.”

🤣  — The Donald
article_summary: Muslim migrant expresses dislike for German Shepherds as 'disgusting' and 'haram', sparking debate about the role of dogs in human society and the perceived animosity between Muslims and dogs. Some users suggest dogs are sensitive to human emotions and may dislike Muslims due to negative associations, while others argue dogs are beneficial to society and have been domesticated by humans for thousands of years.</s>
